short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes 'warm reminder', activates checkbox on CNFans and adds useful features to enhance your shopping experience on the platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CNFans Plus enhances your shopping experience on CNFans by adding useful features and automating common tasks.

Main Features:
- Removes annoying "warm reminder" pop-ups
- Automatically enables required checkboxes
- Calculates total package weights
- Estimates shipping costs in CNY and PLN
- Adds convenient package tracking buttons to make it easier when it comes to track your package
- Currency conversion for better price understanding
- Adds refferal code to CNFans URL

Privacy & Transparency:
- No personal data collection
- Only modifies CNFans.com website
- All features work locally in your browser
- Transparent about functionality and operations
